head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RUTHERFURD, MORTON A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RUTHERFURD, MORTON A.

block.p: RUTHERFURD-Morton A. On June 10 after a long illness. Loving husband of Margaret; beloved son of Guy G. and Georgette W. Rutherfurd; adoring father of Oliver, Nicolas, Victoria, Marina and Catherine; devoted brother of Guy Jr. and Alexander and Leith Talamo. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave at 81st St. Monday, June 12th 2-5pm and 7-9pm. Funeral services will be at St. Thomas More Church, Tuesday, June 13, at 10:30 AM. Burial will be private. In lieu of flowers contributions may be sent to the American Liver Foundation.
